modName: Clean and Smooth Skin for Prometheus Body
summary: An alternative skin texture for Prometheus Better Female Natural Body
descriptionHtml:
This MOD replaces the default diffuse and normal textures used by
the Prometheus Better Female Natural Body with \'cleaner\' and
smoother versions. The MOD is compatible with both the non nude
and nude version of Prometheus female body.

Diffuse texture has been cleaned up, the normal map was redone
from scratch (using Thepal excellent template as base) and better
nipples have been drawn both on the diffuse texture and on the
normal map.

CREDITS
-------

Prometheus for his excellent Prometheus Better Female Natural Body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7198

Thepal for the PSD files used as template for the normal map
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=70
author: MSxyz
